abstract.t: Hierarchical Deterministic Keys enables managing large sets of keys bound to a secure cryptographic device that protects a single key. This enables the development of secure digital identity wallets providing many one-time-use public keys. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-dijkhuis-cfrg-hdkeys/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/sander/hierarchical-deterministic-keys.
